title: Ohtani's Game 4 reminds us of the improbability of his greatness
content: A 469-foot blast, a series-clinching gem on the same night? We got the full Ohtani October experience.

title: Ohtani's 2-way show for the ages sends L.A. to WS
content: Shohei Ohtani pitched six scoreless innings, struck out 10 batters and clobbered three home runs in a performance many of his Dodgers teammates described as the greatest in baseball history.

title: Louisville's 'great plan' rattles Beck, No. 2 Miami
content: Louisville intercepted four of Carson Beck's passes and the Cardinals shocked the No. 2 Hurricanes 24-21 on Friday night.

title: Suárez's clutch slam leaves M's one win from WS
content: Eugenio Suárez hit a go-ahead grand slam after Cal Raleigh's tying drive in a five-run eighth inning, giving the Seattle Mariners a 6-2 win over the Toronto Blue Jays and a 3-2 American League Championship Series lead.

title: Springer hurt on HBP; Schneider calls out fan boos
content: Blue Jays designated hitter George Springer left Game 5 of the ALCS after getting hit by a pitch on his right kneecap in the seventh inning Friday at Seattle. X-rays were negative, according to manager John Schneider.

title: 76ers' Embiid, out nearly 8 months, sees action
content: Joel Embiid started for the 76ers in their preseason finale Friday night, his first game action in nearly eight months.

title: Ovechkin gets 898th goal, Caps win 4th straight
content: Alex Ovechkin scored for the first time this season, notching his 898th career goal in Washington's 5-1 win over Minnesota.

title: Lakers start Vincent for LeBron in opener preview
content: Using Friday's preseason finale as a "dress rehearsal" for next week's regular-season opener, Lakers coach JJ Redick put Gabe Vincent in the starting lineup to fill in for the injured LeBron James.

title: NFL Films' deleted Branch video draws Lions' ire
content: Lions players took offense to an NFL Films video that was released, then deleted, on social media involving suspended safety Brian Branch, claiming it was overly critical.

title: Ready for another wild weekend? The 32 games that demand your attention
content: Ole Miss-Georgia, Bama-Tennessee, LSU-Vandy, plus USC-Notre Dame and more make for a jam-packed weekend.

title: Our guide to every Week 7 NFL game: Matchup previews, predictions, picks and nuggets
content: Offense showdown in Bucs-Lions? Who wins Jayden Daniels vs. Dak Prescott? We have picks, predictions, storylines and stat nuggets for every Week 7 game.

title: The NHL's small-sample shock teams: Who has under- and overperformed?
content: We explore what has happened (good or bad) for seven particular teams -- and predict whether it'll continue.

title: 'There's no Steph without Steve': Steph Curry and Steve Kerr reflect on 11 seasons together
content: As Curry and Kerr enter their 12th season together, they reflect on what forged their bond and what comes next.

title: 'Change is a must': WNBA owners, insiders on Cathy Engelbert, officiating, CBA
content: Have owners and executives lost faith in the WNBA commissioner? We canvassed insiders on the biggest topics at the WNBA Finals.

title: Can Dortmund keep pace with Bayern? We're about to find out
content: Perfect Bayern, unbeaten Dortmund, first vs. second: Der Klassiker doesn't need extra fanfare. This is a meeting of the best in the Bundesliga.

title: The Bush Push revisited: A time capsule of the iconic Notre Dame-USC matchup, 20 years later
content: The Bush Push was more than just an iconic moment in the USC-Notre Dame rivalry -- its aftershocks affected both teams, the 2005 postseason and the rulebook.

title: Don't be surprised if ... Jaxon Smith-Njigba hits 2K, TreVeyon Henderson breaks out
content: Will Seattle's star receiver can keep up his impressive pace? Is a breakout game ahead for a Patriots rookie?

title: Fantasy Football Buzz: What extreme weather means for Dolphins, Browns starters
content: With extreme gusts expected for Dolphins-Browns on Sunday, how does the weather affect the game plan?

title: The NFL trade deadline dream scenario: Barnwell proposes 13 trades that need to happen
content: Jakobi Meyers to the NFC East? Trey Hendrickson and Jaelan Phillips to the same team? Russell Wilson to a contender? Let's build 13 win-win trades.

title: Which teams benefitted most from the transfer portal -- or didn't?
content: Which programs over- or underperformed in the portal ahead of the 2025-26 season based on previous cycles?

title: Expert picks, best bets: Can Reinier de Ridder continue his 2025 win streak?
content: ESPN MMA experts make their predictions and give betting tips for UFC Fight Night from Vancouver, British Columbia.

title: Florida's throwbacks, Oregon's all-white look lead Week 8 college football uniforms
content: Multiple teams are rocking throwbacks in Week 8 of the college football season, led by the Florida Gators.

title: Are Man United too big to fail? The answer might surprise you
content: Where do you begin with fixing Man United? From coaching to player identification to infrastructure, what's the first place to start? We asked some industry insiders and experts for their takes.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Bayern aim to beat Liverpool to Guéhi
content: Liverpool face strong competition from Bayern Munich for Crystal Palace defender Marc Guéhi. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Talent, emotional intelligence and a lifetime of sacrifice have made Oscar Piastri a F1 title favorite
content: There's no doubting Oscar Piastri's talent, but what's set him apart in his F1 title quest is his ability to control his emotions.

title: Week 7 betting guide: Saquon comes to life, Josh Jacobs keeps rolling
content: Our experts dive into the lines and player props that offer value for Week 7 and share their tips and bets.

title: YSRCP urged not to oppose development
content: The proposed investment by Google will create around 1.8 lakh direct and indirect jobs and will transform Vizag into a global AI innovation hub, BJP State spokesperson pointed out

title: Indian Army’s Northern Command sets new benchmarks of preparedness in multi-domain warfare
content: The exercise, over four days, challenged commanders, staff, and troops with futuristic threats in cyber, space, electromagnetic, and cognitive domains, says Defence spokesperson

title: Massive fire breaks out at residential complex housing Rajya Sabha MPs in New Delhi
content: Fire brigade teams arrived at the Brahmaputra Apartment located at Dr. Bishambhar Das Marg in New Delhi

title: V.D. Satheesan questions Kerala govt’s rationale for calling special Assembly sitting on November 1
content: Satheesan accuses govt of ‘throwing political propriety to the winds’ by wilfully keeping the Opposition in the dark about the ‘so-called urgency’ to convene the Assembly on a weekend holiday

title: ‘Let Christ-haters first look in the mirror’: Poet K. Satchidanandan responds to Kerala school hijab row
content: In a Facebook post, Mr. Satchidanandan wrote, “Christ-haters are on the rise. Let them first look in the mirror — and then go to Rajasthan to see Hindu women who cover their faces.”

title: ‘I’m not afraid of contractors or their warnings’, says Karnataka Deputy CM D.K. Shivakumar
content: His statement comes a day after Karnataka State Contractors’ Association warned of releasing a ‘corruption report card’ on the State Government in December if pending bills amounting to ₹33,000 crore from the past two years are not cleared within a month

title: Nandyal police recover nine tola gold jewellery worth lakhs after woman forgets bag in auto
content: “The police received the complaint around 6.30 p.m. on October 17, and the auto was traced and hand bag returned to the complainant by 8 p.m.” the inspector said

title: Operation Numkhor: Bhutan authorities evince interest in joining probe in crackdown on luxury vehicle smuggling
content: ED has already launched a parallel probe, collecting details, including from actor-producer Dulquer Salmaan, whose three cars were seized during the operation

title: Assam Cabinet expanded with induction of BPF MLA Charan Boro
content: Governor Lakshman Prasad Acharya administered the oath of office and secrecy to Charan Boro, the second-time MLA from Majbat constituency

title: Hijab row a ‘shame on secular’ Kerala, says IUML leader P.K. Kunhalikutty
content: IUML national general secretary says ‘some divisive forces’ had been trying to fuel the issue, and that was why the party refrained from responding till now

title: Global Startup Summit in Coimbatore attracted ₹127 crore in investments, says T.N. government
content: The event saw participation from 45 countries, 72,278 visitors, abd 115 investors; as many as 23 memoranda of understanding were signed

title: Traffic snarls across Bengaluru as thousands leave city for Deepavali weekend
content: Bengaluru Traffic Police has identified six potential congestion hotspots — Goraguntepalya, Hebbal, Majestic, Old Madras Road, Mysuru Road, and Hosur Road

title: Chenthamara gets double life term in Sajitha murder case in Kerala
content: Prosecution established that the motive for the murder was Chenthamara’s vindictiveness towards Sajitha, stemming from his belief that she had caused his wife to leave him

title: IPS officer, family booked for 'dowry harassment' after complaint by doctor wife
content: In her 41-page complaint, the wife alleged that she was subjected to dowry demands along with mental and physical harassment

title: Rajnath, Adityanath flag off first batch of Lucknow-made BrahMos missiles
content: BrahMos Aerospace, the manufacturer of the BrahMos supersonic missile system, has successfully produced the first batch of the missile system from its new integration and test facility in Sarojini Nagar, Lucknow

title: Bihar polls: CPI(ML) Liberation releases list of 20 candidates, nominates all 12 sitting MLAs
content: All candidates of Assembly seats, which will go to the polls in the first phase on November 6, 2025 have already filed their nomination papers, says CPI(ML) Liberation general secretary

title: Supreme Court upholds partial demolition of 400-year-old Ahmedabad mosque for road widening project
content: The Supreme Court affirmed the partial demolition of the Mancha Masjid complex in Ahmedabad, holding that the measure, undertaken in the public interest, would not affect the mosque’s main structure

title: CM Stalin slams Union government, questions ‘bias’ against Tamil Nadu
content: Mr. Stalin’s remarks come a day after State Finance Minister Thangam Thennarasu alleged in the Assembly that Centre has consistently shown a political bias against Tamil Nadu by withholding funds meant for education and social welfare projects

title: Platform X used to promote hate speech, economic boycott of Muslims ahead of Deepavali
content: Far-right influencers on X, including verified users with thousands of followers, urged Hindus to boycott Muslim sellers ahead of Deepavali

title: Karnataka PDO suspended after photos of him wearing RSS uniform and participating in Sangh event go viral
content: Photos of the government employee wearing the ganavesh (uniform worn by RSS workers) and holding a lathi have gone viral on social media platforms

title: 11-year-old boy killed, five of family injured in fire at three-storey house in M.P.’s Indore
content: The other five members — a couple, their two daughters and a son — were undergoing treatment, and four of them were on life support

title: Ladki Bahin scheme won't be scrapped under Ajit Pawar, says Minister Zirwal
content: Minister Narhari Zirwal addressed the gathering in Dahanu, where hundreds of workers from the Opposition parties, Shiv Sena (UBT) and NCP (SP), joined the NCP

title: Three Indians dead, five missing in Mozambique boat accident; rescue operations underway
content: Search and rescue operations are actively underway to locate the five missing Indian nationals; local authorities, maritime agencies, and the Indian Mission are jointly coordinating the efforts, stated the High Commission

title: Judicial inquiry ordered into Leh violence to fulfil Ladakh's demand, says Chief Secretary
content: Home Affairs Ministry announced a judicial inquiry headed by a retired Supreme Court Judge into last month's violent clashes in Leh

title: India will not be buying oil from Russia: Trump reiterates
content: Washington has been maintaining that India is helping Vladimir Putin to finance the war through its purchase of Russian crude oil

title: Nagaland reconstitutes panel to review job quota policy
content: A committee of five “advanced” tribes maintains that the reservation policy, introduced in 1977, no longer reflects the current socio-economic and educational realities of the Nagas in the State

title: Kerala IT professional death: Police register case over 'sexual harassment' linked to the death
content: In a 15-page note shared on Instagram, Aji referred to a person identified as ‘NM’, alleging repeated sexual abuse

title: Congress leader slams detention of two journalists from M.P. over publication of 'fake news'
content: The complainant claimed that the duo contacted acquaintances of the Deputy Chief Minister, demanding several crores of rupees to delete the false reports and to refrain from publishing such content in the future

title: New Melsanthis selected for Sabarimala, Malikappuram temples
content: Selections made through draw of lots from a panel of candidates shortlisted by TDB. Both priests will assume charge on November 15, on the eve of the annual Mandala-Makaravilakku pilgrimage season

title: Heavy rain batters Kerala’s Idukki; Mullaperiyar dam shutters opened as water levels rise
content: Peerumade and Udumbanchola taluks witness isolated incidents of mudslides and minor landslips. Heavy rain at Kumily and Nedumkandam floods several houses

title: YSRCP leader Amarnath accuses Lokesh of resorting to personal attacks
content: The YSRCP leader questions the government’s decision to offer concessions worth ₹22,000 crore to Google for the data centre project, without explaining the concrete benefits Visakhapatnam would reap

title: Toil behind sweet success of ‘Atreyapuram Putharekulu’ from A.P.
content: A delicacy local to the Godavari region earns global recognition for its traditional and unique taste. The culinary art behind the sweet is preserved mostly by the women of Atreyapuram mandal, who work tirelessly to earn around ₹1,000 per day

title: How Sana Rezwan reframed Jodhpur, the blue city
content: The patron is determined to take art from centres of power to the masses, at schools, parks and stepwells. And Jodhpur Art Week is a good example

title: Bihar Assembly election LIVE: Over 1,250 file nominations for 1st phase of polls; NDA confident, INDIA bloc in disarray
content: Jharkhand Minister Sudivya Kumar Sonu said he has informed RJD leader Tejashwi Yadav about the seats the JMM is keen to contest in the Bihar elections

title: Two dead, 4 seriously injured in blast at shipyard in south Goa
content: The exact cause of the blast is yet to be ascertained, but witnesses have claimed the explosion happened in a room in the ship where welding work was underway, says an official

title: Massive Fire Breaks Out At Apartments Allotted To Rajya Sabha MPs In Delhi
content: A massive fire erupted at flats allotted to Members of Parliament in Delhi. Visuals showed plumes of smoke rising from the Brahmaputra Apartments at BD Marg. Six fire engines have been rushed to the spot. Efforts are underway to put out the fire.

title: China Expels Top General, Eight Military Officials Over Corruption
content: China's second-highest ranking general and eight other senior officials have been expelled from the ruling Communist Party and the military on suspicion of serious misconduct linked to corruption, the Defence Ministry said Friday.

title: Future Of Humanity Is "Brown": AlphaGeo's Parag Khanna At NDTV World Summit
content: If you have ever wondered what the future of humanity is, futurist Parag Khanna has a one-word answer for you. The future is brown, Khanna, Founder and CEO, AlphaGeo said at the NDTV World Summit 2025.

title: Op Sindoor Just Trailer, Every Inch Of Pak Now Within BrahMos' Range: Rajnath Singh
content: Rajnath Singh was speaking after flagging off the first batch of BrahMos missiles manufactured at the BrahMos Aerospace unit in Lucknow.

title: Chain Snatcher Stabs Cop To Death While Being Taken To Police Station
content: A 42-year-old constable was allegedly stabbed to death by a habitual offender after he was caught in connection with a case in Nizamabad city, police said on Saturday.

title: Nobel Prize Winner, Chinese Physicist Chen-Ning Yang, Dies At 103
content: Chen Ning Yang was born in Hefei, east China's Anhui Province, in 1922. In the 1940s, he went to the United States to pursue academic studies and subsequently held teaching positions. He was awarded the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1957.

title: From Trump Ally To Trump Foe: Who Is John Bolton?
content: John Bolton has spent decades navigating the halls of power in Washington, earning a reputation as a leading foreign policy hawk.

title: From Barracks To Palace: A Look At Soldiers Who Became Presidents Worldwide
content: Weeks of nationwide Gen Z protests in Madagascar sparked by power and water shortages escalated and led to a military coup that forced President Andry Rajoelina into exile and Army officer Col. Michael Randrianirina has been sworn in as new leader

title: Video: Uttarkashi Woman Beats Man With Slipper For Allegedly Misbehaving With Her Daughter
content: A viral video from Uttarkashi shows a woman beating a man after he allegedly misbehaved with her daughter, prompting calls for action from a Hindu organisation.

title: 'India Will Have Deepfake Regulations Very Soon': Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw At NDTV Summit
content: India will "very soon" bring out regulations to counter deepfakes in the AI age, Union Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw announced at the NDTV World Summit in Delhi today. The regulations will have two components instead of just a law on paper, he said.

title: NDTV World Summit 2025 LIVE: Future Is Brown, Says AlphaGeo Founder Parag Khanna
content: NDTV Global World Summit 2025 LIVE Updates: The 2025 edition of the NDTV World Summit, which saw powerful speeches, including by PM Narendra Modi, and impactful discussions yesterday, will see several more global leaders taking stage today.

title: Fraudulent Coal Block Allocation Can Be Treated As Property: Delhi High Court
content: The Delhi High Court has ruled that if a coal block is allotted through deceit or false representation, the allocation itself can be considered "property" under the Prevention of Money Laundering Act (PMLA).

title: DMK Attacks Actor Vijay For Not Visiting Karur After Stampede, TVK Responds
content: TVK spokesperson Loyola Mani, in response to DMK's post, said that the Tamil Nadu Chief Minister MK Stalin-led party is "creating obstacles" to prevent Vijay from visiting Karur.

title: "India Working On 2 nm Chip": Ashwini Vaishnaw Shows 'Wafer' At NDTV Summit
content: Digital credit, fast mobile data and large language models (LLMs) - these are among some of the initiatives that India has taken in its digital-led growth story, Union Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw said at the NDTV World Summit in Delhi today.

title: Can AI Lead To Nightmarish Scenarios? MIT Researcher On What Can Go Wrong
content: Artificial Intelligence (AI) empowers people, but the problem is that it can be used in both good and bad faith, said Neil Thompson, director of the FutureTech Research Project at MIT's Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence Lab.

title: '6G Will Be A Network That Thinks': Ashwini Vaishnaw At NDTV World Summit
content: Union Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw shared India's 6G plans and what this next-generation technology can do in an interaction with NDTV's Vishnu Som at the NDTV World Summit in Delhi today.

title: Afghan, Pakistani Delegations Head To Doha To Resolve Deadly Border Clashes
content: Afghan and Pakistani delegations are heading to the Qatari capital Doha to defuse the deadliest crisis between them in several years, after more than a week of fighting that killed dozens of people and injured hundreds on both sides.

title: Sabarimala Lord Ayyappa Temple Has A New Chief Priest
content: Prasad E D from Thrissur has been selected on Saturday as the new 'melsanthi' (chief priest) of the famed Sabarimala Lord Ayyappa temple.

title: Ex-Peon Posing As Doctor Caught Conducting Illegal Pre-Birth Gender Tests
content: A former peon posing as a doctor was caught red-handed while allegedly conducting illegal fetal sex determination tests in Morena, one of the districts with a low sex ratio in Madhya Pradesh, officials said on Saturday.

title: J&K Govt. move to end RBA category will dilute Kashmiri representation: PDP’s Waheed Parra
content: Parra said the J&K government’s decision to alter the reservation policy was an act of political manipulation.

title: CM Mamata clarifies on outsiders remark, says referred to a party, not people
content: West Bengal Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee alleged that Bhabanipur, the Assembly seat she has been representing, was being filled by ‘bohiragoto (outsiders)‘ in a planned manner.

title: 13 of 17 State-run universities soon to have regular VCs, says Odisha Governor
content: Odisha Governor Hari Babu Kambhampati expresses concern over large vacancies in higher education institutes

title: The murky deaths in the Haryana Police
content: On October 7, an IPS officer from Haryana, Y. Puran Kumar, was found dead in Chandigarh. In a note supposedly written by him, Puran alleged caste-based discrimination by fellow officers. His death came a day after his personal security officer, Sushil Kumar, was booked in an extortion case. Days later, an Assistant Sub Inspector, Sandeep Lather, involved in Sushil’s arrest was also found dead. Vikas Vasudeva and Ashok Kumar report on the case

title: Three murder accused from Rajasthan held in Kolkata; one remains absconding
content: The three men are now in police custody and pending formal handover to the Rajasthan Police for further investigation

title: RJD leader contesting on Congress ticket from Jale seat in Bihar
content: Mishra, a party-hopper who had won Jale seat on JD(U) ticket in a by-election in 2014, comes from a well-known political family of Bihar.

title: Project to support children of incarcerated persons launched in Kannur
content: SPRUHA Plus targets children aged between eight and 18 years, offering holistic care through legal, emotional, and educational support

title: Congress seeks ban on ABVP for alleged violence on campus
content: The NSUI president cited an incident at Delhi University’s B.R. Ambedkar College, where a woman ABVP office-bearer allegedly slapped a professor

title: Day not far when India will be totally free of Maoism: PM Modi
content: With 303 Maoists having surrendered in the past 75 hours and their grip restricted to only three districts in the country, the PM says “areas that were affected by Naxalism will celebrate Diwali for the first time in 60-70 years”.

title: Tamil Nadu leads the country in revenue generated from prison products; over ₹67 cr. collected
content: The State pays ₹300 for skilled workers and ₹270 for semi-skilled workers per day; products, such as ready-made garments, leather shoes, raincoats, and bakery items, are sold under the brand name ‘Freedom’; prisoners are allowed to pursue degrees and diplomas offered by Tamil Nadu Open University

title:
INDIA muddle: RJD, Congress, and VIP in ‘friendly fight’
in seven constituencies
content: While no party, except the Congress, has released its candidate list amid dragging seat-sharing talks, many have filed their nominations on the last day for the first phase of the election. VIP chief Mukesh Sahani announces that he is not contesting the upcoming Bihar Assembly elections.

title: Hotels association moots international consulates, tourism hub at Rushikonda
content: Andhra Pradesh Star Hotels Association recommends a PPP-based luxury resort and business consulate complex in Visakhapatnam, while Jana Vignana Vedika suggests a science and cultural museum as an alternative

title: Social media influencer Manish Kasyap to contest from Bihar's Chanpatia seat on Jan Suraaj ticket
content: The YouTuber was arrested in 2023 by Tamil Nadu Police for allegedly spreading misinformation regarding attacks on Bihar's migrants

title: Adapt to emerging technologies, students urged
content: RGUKT–Andhra Dean Sravani Duvvuri highlights the growing role of quantum technologies while inaugurating “OMNITRIX 2025” hackathon at Siddhartha Academy

title: Supreme Court quashes multiple FIRs under Uttar Pradesh Act on religious conversion, says law not tool to harass innocents
content: Justice Pardiwala found that the FIRs were vitiated by legal infirmities, procedural lapses, and lack of credible material

title: Two students diagnosed with mild jaundice, one with malaria in Saluru residential schools
content: Health condition of students across residential institutions in Saluru mandal remains stable, say officials adding over 2,900 screened as precautionary measure against seasonal fevers

title: Tamil Nadu Assembly rejects the Governor’s observations, readopts Tamil Nadu Fiscal Responsibility (Amendment) Bill, 2024
content: The Bill seeks to postpone the achievement of zero revenue deficit and 3% fiscal deficit by another year, R.N. Ravi said while returning the Bill

title: IAS, IPS officers’ interim applications for vacating stay over Nagaram lands dismissed
content: Petitioner contends that the said lands actually belonged to the Bhoodan Yajna Board and were purchased by private persons, and these transactions required an investigation by the Enforcement Directorate

title: Supreme Court raps Centre, States for ‘gross apathy’ over opportunities for transgender persons
content: Bench of the top court forms a committee headed by former Delhi High Court judge Justice Asha Menon to draft an equal opportunity policy for transgender persons

title: Bhojpuri actors add star power to Bihar poll contest
content: Popular personalities like Pawan Singh, Manoj Tiwari, Ravi Kishan, and Dinesh Lal Yadav ‘Nirahua’ feature prominently in the BJP’s list of 40 star campaigners.

title: Embraer inaugurates India office, signs agreement with Mahindra group to develop a hub for C-390 military transport aircraft
content: Embraer also plans to build capacity in India to capitalise on opportunities within the country’s aerospace and defense industry

title: Resolution of Palestinian question necessary for India-Middle East-Europe-Economic Corridor: Egyptian FM
content: In Delhi for the first India-Egypt Strategic Dialogue, Abdelatty urges India to join the Egyptian Suez Canal Economic Zone; meets Jaishankar, calls on PM Modi; IMEC project, unveiled at the G-20 Summit in 2023, stalled soon after due to Gaza war

title: Madras High Court CJ to take a call on listing cases related to framing of guidelines for political rallies
content: His Division Bench directs the Registry to place the matter before him, on the administrative side, for issuing necessary instructions

title: Rotavirus vaccine effective against gastroenteritis in children: study
content: In 2016, India introduced Rotavac, an indigenous oral rotavirus vaccine, administered at 6, 10 and 14 weeks of age, in its Universal Immunisation Programme. When a vaccine is introduced in the UIP, it is provided free to all eligible beneficiaries.

title: Just a few candidates for a population of 17.7%: Muslims still get short shrift
content: BJP has not fielded any Muslims, while Congress and Janata Dal(U) have named four and LJP(RV) one; Prashant Kishor’s Jan Suraaj Party promised to field 40 and named 21; the Muslim population is over 20% in 87 constituencies, and about 75% of the community in the State live in northern Bihar

title: Commence recruitment immediately, Santosh Hegde tells State govt.
content: Santosh Hegde says that it is unfortunate that the State government is not considering the problem of unemployment seriously

title: A.P. Police arrest two persons from U.P., Maharashtra for terror links
content: They are found to be active members of WhatsApp groups and channels of Jaish-e-Mohammed and were planning to radicalise youth and also take military training in Pakistan to wage a war against India, says SP

title: Contractors’ association gives December deadline to government to clear pending bills
content: Karnataka State Contractors Association has warned that it will release the ‘corruption report card’ of the government in December, if the pending amount of ₹33,000 crore

title: Villagers ‘resisted’ smugglers from Bangladesh, says India after Dhaka condemns death of Bangladesh citizens in Tripura
content: Ministry of External Affairs spokesperson says incident highlights need for Bangladesh to undertake necessary measures to uphold sanctity of the international border

title: Tamil Nadu government announces holiday on October 21
content: The State government has taken the decision considering the convenience of students, teachers, and government employees to return from their natives after Deepavali

title: Adi Karmayogi initiative helping Adivasis think and speak for themselves: President Murmu at National Conclave
content: At National Conclave in New Delhi, President says the government aims to build self-reliance and participation among tribal communities through the programme

title: Pak-Afghan clashes: Trump blames Islamabad; calls conflict 'easy' to solve
content: US President Donald Trump on Friday claimed that Pakistan attacked Afghanistan, asserting he could easily resolve the conflict. On Saturday, Pakistan announced talks with the Afghan Taliban in Qatar after launching air strikes that killed at least 10 people, breaking a recent ceasefire. Afghanistan accused Pakistan of bombing three locations, vowing retaliation.

title: 'Don’t cross the limit': Jharkhand HC advocate tells judge; verbal spat goes viral
content: Jharkhand High Court's full bench issued a criminal contempt notice to advocate Mahesh Tewari for a heated exchange with Justice Rajesh Kumar.  The advocate's statement, "The country is burning with the judiciary," aired live and went viral. Tewari must respond within three weeks, with the next hearing on November 11.

title: 'I've been played all my life ... ': Trump says Putin might be buying time
content: President Trump expressed skepticism that Russian President Putin's agreement to a new summit might be a tactic to delay ending the Ukraine war, though he believes Putin wants a deal. Trump met with Ukrainian President Zelenskyy, calling his call with Putin "productive" and believing peace is achievable, despite acknowledging "tremendous bad blood" between the leaders.

title: Bihar elections: Folk singer Maithili Thakur files nomination from Alinagar
content: Folk singer and BJP leader Maithili Thakur has filed her nomination papers from the Alinagar Assembly constituency for the upcoming Bihar elections. She expressed her commitment to the service, development, and welfare of the people of Alinagar, thanking party leadership and supporters for their trust and blessings.

title: Upset Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang says: Our market share has fallen to Zero from 95% in ...
content: Nvidia's advanced AI chip dominance in China has evaporated, dropping to zero due to US export controls. CEO Jensen Huang revealed the company is completely barred from selling high-performance chips, warning this exclusion harms both nations and cedes the market to domestic rivals like Huawei.  China's push for self-sufficiency accelerates this shift.

title: 3 Afghan cricketers killed: What happens to tri-series in Pak after Kabul's withdrawal?
content: Pakistan Cricket Board confirms a three-nation T20I tournament will proceed in Lahore from November 17-29, despite Afghanistan's withdrawal. Discussions are underway to secure a replacement team, with Sri Lanka already confirmed as a participant. The PCB is considering associate nations but prioritizes a Test-playing country.

title: Cincinnati balcony collapse: 20 injured in fall from 3rd floor; what we know
content: A third-floor balcony collapsed near the University of Cincinnati on Friday evening, sending ten people to the hospital, including one critically injured. Officials reported five serious injuries and four minor ones, with the building primarily housing students celebrating a recent exam. An investigation into the cause of the collapse is underway.

title: Badminton: Tanvi Sharma enters final of World Junior Championship
content: Tanvi Sharma secured at least a silver medal at the BWF World Junior Championships by defeating China's Liu Si Ya in the semi-finals. She will face Thailand's Anyapat Phichitpreechasak in the gold medal match, aiming to add to her earlier bronze from the Badminton Asia Junior Championships.

title: ScaleAl lays off an entire team; then invites employees to..
content: Scale AI has disbanded its Dallas-based New Projects Organization, a team of contractors focused on general AI chatbot improvement. This move, following a significant Meta investment, signals an industry pivot towards specialized, expert-level AI training in fields like medicine and robotics.  Affected workers received severance and were offered opportunities on Scale's gig platform.

title: Thinking of Diwali gifts? FASTag Annual Pass might be a good option!
content: Struggling with Diwali gift ideas for travelers? Consider the FASTag annual pass! This innovative offering from the Ministry of Road Transport and Highways provides seamless national highway travel for a year or 200 toll crossings, whichever comes first, for just Rs 3,000.

title: Gujarat’s Sabarkantha: 30 vehicles vandalised; 20 arrested after arson, stone pelting
content: A violent clash between two groups in Gujarat's Sabarkantha district on Friday night left at least 10 people injured and over 30 vehicles vandalized. Police have registered an FIR and arrested 20 individuals, citing a long-standing rivalry as the cause of the stone pelting and arson.

title: Telangana: Man stabs cop to death while being taken to police station
content: A 42-year-old constable, E Pramod, was fatally stabbed by a habitual offender in Nizamabad city while being transported to a police station. The accused, involved in chain snatching and theft, attacked Pramod with a knife on his chest before fleeing. Police have launched a search operation and registered a murder case.

title: Bezos' ex-wife cuts Amazon share; Slashes stake by $12.6bn; Increases charity
content: MacKenzie Scott has significantly reduced her Amazon stake, cutting holdings by nearly 42% to $12.6 billion. This reduction occurred despite Amazon's stock performance and follows her extensive philanthropic efforts, which have heavily focused on diversity, equity, and inclusion initiatives. The exact reasons for the stake reduction, whether sales or donations, remain unspecified.

title: Watch: ICE agents barge into Portland family's home; point gun at them as baby cries
content: ICE agents kicked down a door and pointed guns at a mother holding her infant during a raid in Portland, Oregon. The family claims the detained men entered legally, while a DHS official stated the operation targeted a previously removed violent criminal. The main suspect remains at large.

title: Three Afghan cricketers killed in attack on Pak border; Rashid Khan breaks down
content: Afghanistan has withdrawn from a tri-nation series with Pakistan and Sri Lanka after three local cricketers were killed in an attack. The Afghanistan Cricket Board identified the victims and stated the attack was carried out by the Pakistani regime. The decision to withdraw is a gesture of respect to the victims.

title: Hyderabad scandal: Landlord held for installing hidden camera in woman’s washroom
content: A 23-year-old woman in Hyderabad discovered a hidden camera in her rented flat's washroom, allegedly installed by her landlord and an electrician. Police registered a case and arrested the landlord after the woman reported the incident. The electrician is currently absconding.

title: Bengaluru college student killed by slitting throat for rejecting marriage proposal
content: A 20-year-old pharmacy student was brutally murdered near a railway track after rejecting a marriage proposal from her neighbour, 28-year-old Vignesh. Police arrested Vignesh, the main accused, and another individual who allegedly harboured him. The victim, Yamini Priya, was attacked with a sharp weapon when she refused his persistent advances. A murder case has been registered.

title: Happy Diwali 2025: 200+ best wishes, messages and quotes to share with loved ones
content: Diwali, the festival of lights, is celebrated with great fervor, symbolizing hope, knowledge, and love. Families gather to share happiness, exchange gifts, and create lasting memories. The article provides 150+ wishes, messages, and quotes to help express gratitude and spread joy during this auspicious occasion.

title: High-level Doha talks: Pak sends top officials to meet Afghan Taliban
content: Pakistan launched deadly airstrikes in Afghanistan, killing at least 10 people including three cricketers, shattering a two-day ceasefire. Senior Pakistani officials were en route to Qatar for talks with Afghanistan just hours after the attack. The strikes drew condemnation from Afghanistan's cricket captain, leading to the national team's withdrawal from an upcoming series against Pakistan.

title: 60-year-old UP man who couldn’t afford lawyer walks out of jail after 11 years
content: After enduring 11 years of wrongful imprisonment for a murder he did not commit, a farmer's long fight for justice has finally paid off. Misfortune and poverty had deprived him of legal aid, leaving him in a nightmarish limbo for over three decades.

title: Gold prices on Dhanteras: How record gold rates will shape festive buying - explained
content: Dhanteras 2025 sees Indian gold buyers facing record prices, leading to a strategic shift towards lightweight jewellery and investment products like coins and digital gold. Despite high costs, a positive buying sentiment persists, fueled by FOMO and increased disposable income from tax cuts, ensuring a robust value-driven festive season.

title: Zubeen Garg death probe: Assam Police nab man for posting controversial video
content: In a dramatic twist, Assam Police apprehended Md Injamul Hoque for creating a contentious video surrounding the death of popular singer Zubeen Garg in Singapore. Although authorities in Singapore are treating the case as an accidental drowning, Hoque admitted to manipulating and publishing provocative statements.

title: Shubman Gill reveals behind-the-scenes moments with Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli
content: Shubman Gill, taking over as India's ODI captain, has dispelled any notions of a rift with Rohit Sharma, emphasizing their continued strong relationship and Sharma's helpful guidance. Gill expressed his honor in leading alongside legends Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma, drawing inspiration from their careers and valuing their experience as he aims to build on the team's legacy.

title: Kanpur shocker: Seating dispute leads to fake bomb threat on Amrapali Express
content: A bomb threat to the Amrapali Express at Kanpur Central Railway Station triggered a massive police and railway response. After an extensive search yielded no explosives, authorities traced the false alarm to two brothers. They confessed to fabricating the threat due to a seating dispute on the train, leading to their arrest and ongoing legal action.

title: Bronze for India! Jyothi Vennam creates history at World Archery Final
content: Jyothi Surekha Vennam made history as the first Indian woman compound archer to win a medal at the World Cup Final, securing bronze in Nanjing. She achieved this by defeating world No. 2 Ella Gibson with a perfect performance, shooting 15 consecutive 10s. This marks a significant achievement for Vennam in her World Cup Final journey.

title: MLA Putta Sudhakar Yadav conned by fake Mumbai cops; loses Rs 1.07 crore
content: Telugu Desam Party MLA Putta Sudhakar Yadav lost ₹1.07 crore to cybercriminals impersonating Mumbai cyber crime officials. The fraudsters threatened him with arrest in a fabricated money laundering and human trafficking case, demanding money for 'provisional bail'. The MLA reported the incident after realizing he was duped.

title: Colombia: Anti-Trump protesters fire arrows at police outside US embassy
content: Four police officers were injured outside the US embassy in Bogota, Colombia, after protesters launched arrows and explosives. The demonstration, organized by "Congreso de los Pueblos," aimed to oppose US policies and assert Colombian sovereignty. President Petro urged caution, noting a radical faction attacked police.

title: Gold & silver outlook: Will precious metals glitter or lose shine? Here's what experts say
content: Gold and silver prices are near record highs, presenting investors with a dilemma. Experts advise caution due to potential headwinds like easing geopolitical tensions and changing rate cut expectations. Investors are encouraged to hedge, book profits, or wait for dips before entering the market.

title: Punjab: Fire breaks out in AC coach of Amritsar-Saharsa Garib Rath Express; one injured
content: On Saturday morning, a fire erupted in one of the AC coaches of the Amritsar-Saharsa Garib Rath Express near Sirhind. Thankfully, all passengers were promptly evacuated from the stricken compartment, and fortunately, there were no injuries reported. Railway officials responded swiftly to the incident, ensuring the safety of all travelers as they worked to contain the situation.

title: Diwali bank holidays: Are banks closed for 3 days this weekend? See state-wise list
content: Diwali 2025 brings a series of state-specific bank holidays, with most branches remaining open nationwide on Dhanteras, except in Assam. Several states will observe closures from October 20th to 23rd for various Diwali-related festivals. Online banking and ATMs will remain accessible during these closures.

title: Trump's 100% tariff: US and China seek fresh trade talks 'as soon as possible'
content: China and the US are set to resume trade talks soon, aiming to de-escalate escalating tariff tensions. This comes after US President Trump suggested a 100% tariff might not be sustainable, while also hinting at potential further levies. The discussions follow recent export controls by Beijing and mixed signals from both economic powers.

title: Car bomb explodes in Italy: Anti-mafia journalist targeted
content: A prominent Italian journalist, Sigfrido Ranucci, narrowly escaped a bomb attack on his car, which exploded near his home in Pomezia. His daughter had left the scene just 20 minutes prior. The blast caused significant damage but no injuries. Ranucci, who has been living under police protection due to mafia threats, received strong condemnation from Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni and other government officials.

title: Canadian man highlights India’s footpath conditions - video goes viral
content: A viral video shows the difficulties of walking on Indian footpaths. Content creator Caleb Friesen struggled with a baby stroller in Bengaluru, encountering numerous obstructions. His post humorously ranked these obstacles, placing pedestrians last. The video has sparked conversations about footpath accessibility across Indian cities. Friesen aims to raise awareness about these issues.

title: 'I pray for everyone's happiness, prosperity & health': PM wishes nation on Dhanteras
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi and other dignitaries on Saturday extended heartfelt Dhanteras greetings to citizens, praying for happiness, prosperity, and good health. Leaders emphasised the significance of the festival, linking it to wealth, health, and the birth anniversary of Lord Dhanvantari, while also urging for environmental protection and social harmony.

title: Ind vs Aus: Virat Kohli, Rohit Sharma set to smash multiple records in Australia
content: Indian cricket titans Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma are poised to etch their names further in history during the upcoming ODI series against Australia. Kohli is on the cusp of becoming the second-highest ODI run-scorer, while Rohit eyes his 500th international cap and a record for most ODI sixes.

title: 'Will take time': UN issues warning on Gaza famine; urges opening of crossings
content: The UN warns that ending the Gaza famine requires time and opening all crossings to flood the region with food. Nearly 3,000 tonnes of food have arrived since a ceasefire, with the World Food Programme scaling up aid.  More distribution points and bakeries are planned, but urgent calls persist for unimpeded access to save lives.

title: Halloween horror in Virginia: Masked trio tries to break into home - video
content: Three masked individuals, dressed as Michael Myers, a clown, and a nun, terrorized a widow's home in Alexandria, Virginia, on Halloween night.  The intruders threatened to kill the occupants and attempted to break in, forcing the family to fear for their safety. Police are investigating the serious incident, which is being compared to 'The Purge'.

title: 'Cowardly attack by Pak': ACB mourns loss of 3 players; withdraws from Tri-Nation series
content: Three Afghan cricketers, Kabeer, Sibghatullah, and Haroon, were tragically killed in an attack in Paktika province. The Afghanistan Cricket Board blamed the "Pakistani regime" for the "cowardly attack." In response, Afghanistan has withdrawn from an upcoming T20I series against Pakistan. Captain Rashid Khan condemned the incident, calling it "immoral and barbaric."

title: 'India won't be buying Russian oil': Trump doubles down on claim, despite MEA's fact-check
content: US President Donald Trump asserted India would cease buying Russian oil, a claim swiftly refuted by New Delhi. The Ministry of External Affairs clarified no recent calls occurred between Prime Minister Modi and President Trump, with their last official communication being on October 9. India continues to defend its energy imports based on national interest and security.

title: 'ODI captaincy bhi mil sakti thi mujhe': Suryakumar spills the beans on ambition
content: Suryakumar Yadav, fresh off leading India to the Asia Cup title, revealed his past aspirations for ODI captaincy. He believes a stronger ODI performance could have opened doors, and despite Shubman Gill now leading in ODIs, Surya hasn't entirely given up on the dream. He's set to captain India in an upcoming T20I series against Australia.

title: Bengaluru college rape: Accused student had offered to bring pill
content: A 21-year-old engineering student was arrested and suspended for allegedly raping his senior in a college washroom. The survivor filed a complaint five days after the October 10 incident, leading to the accused's arrest and judicial custody. College authorities confirmed forming a committee to inquire into the matter.

title: College football: Why Texas Tech-ASU is worth two bets this week
content: the market moves from Colorado State -1.5 to -2.5 . it feels reactionary after the Rams crushed Fresno State . the result was built on turnover luck and fluky short fields . there are lines that overreacted and matchups that look nothing like what the market thinks they are .

title: Chargers' new 'Charger Power' alternate, Lions' all-black lead NFL Week 7 uniforms
content: it's the first time in franchise history the Chargers will wear a gold jersey . the look is meant to channel the energy and "progressive nature" of the air coryell days . on "Thursday Night Football," the Cincinnati Bengals are hosting their annual "White Bengal" game .

title: 2025-26 coaching hot seat, retirement guide
content: bob greene: the tectonic shift that deals and revenue sharing have sparked in college sports has not spared the men's basketball coaching carousel and the hot seat discussion . he says it's now clear that patience is at an all-time low if new hires aren't cutting it after two years, they're likely getting forced out the door or at least under significant pressure .

title: Premier League re-rank: Arsenal top; Spurs' unsustainable path
content: the premier league's new financial anchoring rule is proposed . it's a random, low-scoring sport where conversion rates fluctuate massively from game to game . there are so many ways you can get out over your skis by drawing too many conclusions before we get to Halloween .

title: Flacco finds vintage form as Bengals win battle of 40-something QBs
content: the Bengals beat the Pittsburgh Steelers 33-31 in an AFC North showdown . the Cincinnati Bengals traded for quarterback Joe Flacco . he threw for 342 yards and three touchdowns in the win .

content: Max Verstappen takes top spot in SQ3 to grab pole position . shortened race was 0.071 seconds quicker than his late lap for the race . the two remain free to race, but a collision could open the door for another Vera .

title: Reversal of colonial times: IAF to train UK’s Royal Air Force
content: two top guns from the Indian Air Force will train RAF aircrew officers . they will be training at the no. 4 Flying Training School in RAF Valley . their salaries will be paid by India, while the ministry of defence will provide accommodation .

title: Week 8 preview: Ranking Heisman contenders, plus key matchups and top quotes
content: the third Saturday in October delivers a lot of good things in college football . the SEC figures to dominate the spotlight, as it often does, as Ole Miss and Georgia tangle between the hedges . there is also non-SEC action to monitor, including the USC - Notre Dame rivalry, which hopefully will extend beyond Saturday .

title: Mock draft: Betts, Fudd or Miles at No. 1?
content: the WNBA is negotiating a new collective bargaining agreement with the union . the draft lottery, expansion drafts for Toronto and Portland and a mammoth free agency will have to take place before the 2026 draft . five of our top six selections in this mock were eligible to go in the 2025 draft, but all opted to return for a return trip .

title: Ranking the top 25 college football players midway through the 2025 season
content: a midseason top 25 is supposed to look like a major league baseball all-star team . it's hard to separate the flash in the pan from the real deal . a bunch of players we love didn't make the cut . the good news is that a few of the biggest names don't keep this hot start through December .

title: Bontemps and Windhorst: The latest intel on the Lakers, Knicks, Rockets and more
content: the deadline for extensions for most eligible players is Monday at 6 p.m. ET . there's a lot of pessimism right now, even by normal standards . a star-studded free agent class in the summer of 2027 could all be available .

title: A perfect Berkeley paradox: Big-money college football and an antiestablishment protest
content: activists began a tree-sit in 2006 to protest the removal of an oak grove next to the stadium . the patch of campus had embodied one of the many contradictions of Berkeley . "it was like a fricking circus," Tedford said recently .

title: 🏀 Fantasy NBA predictions: LaMelo 70+ games!
content: our fantasy basketball experts tasked them with detailing their boldest predictions for 2025-26 . he's currently 85th on average in ESPN live drafts, and his ability to create offense for others is only growing . Miller's coaching staff already trust him to find his own shot .
